products.title: Splash Duck Egg Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg perfect fit roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it will update most spaces, perfect for introducing colour when paired with natural and wooden tones. Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window frame, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. The framework comes in 4 different shades to match your window frame.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash dark grey is a stylish, on trend colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. This blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Chilli Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash chilli red perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this medium red perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Mood Fr Voile Cosmic Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their mood voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. Mood fr voile cosmic grey is a semi-translucent stylish, lightgrey roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in this modern grey shade, that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. A flame retardant coating, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space.

products.title: Genesis Dark Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This dark grey perfect fit roller blind is bang on trend and will add effortless style to any room in your home. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws. Product id: sdb-pfr0173 fabric colour: dark grey material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis dark grey perfect fit roller blind in grey.

products.title: Genesis Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their genesis range comes in 6 colour variations and is the perfect choice for a modern look. This grey perfect fit roller blind is stylish, crisp and will therefore look great in any room in your home. The perfect fit aspect of this blind means it can clip straight on to pvc window frames - saving space and meaning no drills or screws. Product id: sdb-pfr0174 fabric colour: grey material: 100% polyester headrail: drill-free slimline frame with sleek roller casing control type: cordless spring operated energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes genesis grey perfect fit roller blind in grey.

products.title: Louella Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: Let your home interior ooze sophistication and glamour with their plush velvet louella charcoal roller blind. From the harlequin additions collection, their exquisite roller blind will add a chic and sleek feel to your room. The delicate trail of flowers and leaves gracefully co let your home interior ooze sophistication and glamour with their plush velvet louella charcoal roller blind.

products.title: Amity Mist Roller Blind
products.description: Let your room ooze sophistication and elegance with their amity mist roller blind. From the harlequin additions collection, their roller blind is bound to be a charming delight. Pretty white dandelions cover the beautiful fabric whilst the cool mist blue creates a serene environ let your room ooze sophistication and elegance with their amity mist roller blind.

products.title: Aurelia Steel Roller Blind
products.description: Add the final touch of elegance to your home interior with their stunning aurelia steel roller blind. From the harlequin additions collection, the stylish blind oozes both modernity and sophistication. The romantic overblown paisley damask design and the plush velvet fabric ma add the final touch of elegance to your home interior with their stunning aurelia steel roller blind.

products.title: Amity Silver Roller Blind
products.description: Glamorous and chic, their amity silver roller blind will instantly uplift your home interior. The warm silver and the fresh white make a complementary pair, a combination that is very much on-trend. Then theres the dainty, dandelions that cover the fabric in unified rows crea glamorous and chic, their amity silver roller blind will instantly uplift your home interior.

products.title: Kinabalu Silver Roller Blind
products.description: Admire the majestic elephants and their offspring as they make their way through the trees in this harlequin additions design. Showcased in a beautiful soft grey, the etched design is not like any other and brings rustic charm to interiors. The linings available ensure you admire the majestic elephants and their offspring as they make their way through the trees in this harlequin additions design.

products.title: Kinabalu Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: Majestic elephants march through the botanical plants with their offspring by their side in this harlequin additions design. Beautifully etched in a contemporary grey, theres a lot to love about this design. Its charming, versatile and adds plenty of character to any space it majestic elephants march through the botanical plants with their offspring by their side in this harlequin additions design.

products.title: Amity Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: A velvet finish and a refined and sophisticated design make their amity charcoal roller blind one not to miss. From the harlequin additions collection, the white dandelion design on the chic grey charcoal is both contemporary and sleek. The on-trend colour of grey gives the bl a velvet finish and a refined and sophisticated design make their amity charcoal roller blind one not to miss.

products.title: Blowing Grasses Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: The feathery grasses in this stunning clarissa hulse roller blind design encapsulate the hazy british summer perfectly. Silhouetted against an earthy pebble background they'll make a gorgeous addition to any home. Printed on a gorgeous slubby fabric this textured roller blind has the feathery grasses in this stunning clarissa hulse roller blind design encapsulate the hazy british summer perfectly.

products.title: Tropical Leaves Pebble Roller Blind
products.description: Bring the vibrancy and life of the rainforest into your home with this stunning tropical leaves design by clarissa hulse. Inspired by the cloud forests of costa rica it features a multitude of leaves and ferns all picked out in exquisite detail. The simple, pebble tone makes this bring the vibrancy and life of the rainforest into your home with this stunning tropical leaves design by clarissa hulse.

products.title: Trellis Steel Roller Blind
products.description: This trellis steel roller blind couldnt feel more modern if it tried. It takes on funky dory geometric pattern and pairs it with one of the trendiest colours around; grey. If that wasnt enough, this incredible window dressing is part of their harlequin additions collection, gi this trellis steel roller blind couldnt feel more modern if it tried.

products.title: Woodland, Rosemist - Roman Blind
products.description: This woodland inspired design brings charcoal into alignment with a portfolio of autumnal colours to give your home something to really smile about. Look closer and you'll see the artistry required to create each leafy branch as the fabric takes on a life of its own. Partnering rosemist with a light grey feature wall and dark wooden floor is an inspired way to extend its colour spectrum out into your room.

products.title: Nightshade, Chrome - Day Night Blind
products.description: In silky silver, the nightshade in chrome offers not only style but versatile practicality too. In between the cool grey, double layered fabric sit sliding translucent strips, which can be moved up and down to ensure flexible light control. Combine the chrome with a contemporary all-white kitchen, foregoing conventional colour and opting for a stark look full of clean lines and sharp metallics. Keep the base of the room white, and choose chrome fixtures, fittings, and appliances for a distinct and stunning aesthetic.

products.title: Nightshade, Steel - Day Night Blind
products.description: In the nightshade steel, translucent netting is easily adjusted between double layered fabric to allow more or less privacy and light. The featured cloth is a tightly stitched silver affair, thicker than that of other ranges to further protect from outside lights. Whilst the steel will match a range of colour schemes, it will look particularly striking amidst a navy and white colour scheme in a dining room.

products.title: Rift Softshade Mono Grey Day And Night Blind
products.description: Add the finishing touch to a clean and contemporary interior with the rift softshade mono day and night roller blind. This blind makes creating optimum light levels in your home super easy. The practical design of cool grey fabric panels with translucent voile strips in-between enables you to gain a sense of privacy with partial shading - perfect for making the most of natural light. Product id: db-vrbx1877 fabric colour: mono grey material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white brackets control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er1 - lowest energy saving value - due to blind type or fabric light filtering: yes rift softshade mono grey day and night blind in white/grey/black.

products.title: William Morris Strawberry Thief Velvet Taupe Roman Blind
products.description: One of william morriss best-known designs, strawberry thief was first created in 1883 and its still an incredibly popular design today. Part of their william morris range in collaboration with the v&a, strawberry thief was originally named by morris after the thrushes that one of william morriss best-known designs, strawberry thief was first created in 1883 and its still an incredibly popular design today.
